comment: A constructed pre-Hilbert space is a structure. Starting from ~ lmodstr (which has 4 members), we chain ~ strleun once more, adding an ordered pair to the function, to get all 5 members. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 1-Oct-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 29-Aug-2015.)
